title: Facebook’s Libra loses another member company, this time telecom giant Vodafone
text:
Vodafone is the eighth major Libra Association member company to depart.
The British telecom giant Vodafone is leaving the Libra Association, the governing body behind Facebook’s troubled global digital currency initiative.
